pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Vault Altar$() is the core block in your Vault Hunters Journey. $(br)It has the power to infuse $(l:get_started/vault_rock)Vault Rocks$() into usable $(#033dfc)Vault Crystals$() that grant access to the Vault dimension. $(br)To use the $(#033dfc)Vault Altar$(), a $(l:get_started/vault_rock)Vault Rock$() needs to be placed on it, following that, it will request $(#033dfc)4 Items$() of various types which you will need to provide by throwing or right clicking the Altar with the requested items.

pages.title: Vault Altar
pages.text: Once it's requests are met, a $(#f00)redstone signal$() will need to be provided for the Vault Rock to be infused.

pages.title: Advanced use
pages.text: Once you have further progressed in the Modpack, you can automate the $(#033dfc)Vault Altar$() by importing items into it, for example via a $(#033dfc)Hopper$() or transportation methods provided by $(#033dfc)other mods$(), for example Applied Energistics 2 $(#033dfc)Export Busses$() or Refined Storage $(#033dfc)Exporters$().
